mapper.select: select o.order_id as orderId, o.registered_book_id as bookId, b.title, b.price, b.image_url as imageUrl, o.order_date as orderDate, o.cancel_status as cancelStatus, o.delivery_status as deliveryStatus from orders o, book b, registered_book r where r.registered_book_id = o.registered_book_id and b.book_id = r.book_id and o.member_id = #{memberId}

select content, star, review_date as reviewDate, b.title, b.image_url as imageUrl from review r, member m, registered_book rb, book b where r.member_id = m.member_id and rb.registered_book_id = r.registered_book_id and rb.book_id = b.book_id and r.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into review (member_id, content, star, review_date, registered_book_id) values (#{memberId}, #{content}, #{star}, now(), #{bookId})
